description: Extension of Beatty sequence, complement of A045749.
comments: (s,t)-sequences; the case s=3, t=1.Complement of A187749.  It appears likely that A045750(n)=A187571(n) for all n>=1; the equation has been verified for n up to 500. - _Clark Kimberling_, Apr 02 2011
references: Clark Kimberling, Complementary Equations, Journal of Integer Sequences, Vol. 10 (2007), Article 07.1.4.
links: A. S. Fraenkel, Heap games, numeration systems and sequences, Annals of Combinatorics, 2 (1998), 197-210.
Index entries for sequences related to Beatty sequences
mathematica: s=3; t=1;mex:=First[Complement[Range[1, Max[#1]+1], #1]]&;a[0]=0; b[n_]:=b[n]=s*a[n]+t*n;a[n_]:=a[n]=mex[Flatten[Table[{a[i], b[i]}, {i, 0, n-1}]]];Table[a[n], {n, 200}] (* A045749 *)Table[b[n], {n, 200}] (* A045750 *)(* From _Clark Kimberling_, Apr 02 2011 *)
author: _Aviezri S. Fraenkel_
